challenge.title: Delete One Document Using model.findByIdAndRemove
challenge.description: findByIdAndRemove and findOneAndRemove are like the previous update methods. They pass the removed document to the db. As usual, use the function argument personId as the search key.
challenge.instructions: Modify the removeById function to delete one person by the person's _id. You should use one of the methods findByIdAndRemove() or findOneAndRemove().
